ApplicationFormEvalPtcp.name: ApplicationFormEvalPtcp
ApplicationFormEvalPtcp.description: Represents information about a user or group of participants who have access to an application form evaluation.

ApplicationFormEvaluationId.description: The application form evaluation associated with the application form evaluation participant record.

Comments.description: The comments about why the participant has access to the application form evaluation.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the participant's association with the application form evaluation is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the application form evaluation participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the application form evaluation participant record.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role associated with the application form evaluation participant record.
